Module kivakit.settings
Package com.telenav.kivakit.settings

Class DeploymentSet

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.settings.DeploymentSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class DeploymentSet extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater implements com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait
A set of Deployment objects, each being a set of settings objects. Deployments can be added to the set from a folder with addDeploymentsIn(ResourceFolder). A switch parser to select a deployment from the command line can be retrieved with deploymentSet(Listener, Deployment, Deployment...).

Loading

  • loadDeploymentSet(Listener, Class)

Creation

  • deploymentSet(Listener, Deployment, Deployment...)

Adding Deployments

  • add(Deployment)
  • addAll(Collection)
  • addDeploymentsIn(ResourceFolder)

Accessing Deployments

  • deployment(String)
  • deployments()
  • switchParser(String)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
